metadata.name: Mega Satan Key Ritual
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod adds an alternative way to obtain the Mega Satan Key.
[h1]How it works[/h1] Once you have [b]20[/b] keys, if you return to the starting room of the floor*, you can exchange [b]all[/b] your hearts**, coins, keys, bombs for the Mega Satan Key by stepping on the spikes on the ground.
Additional rules: [list] [*]If you already own 1 piece of the key, you will recive 1 black hearts intead. [*]If you own 1 or more items from Angel Item Pool, the ritual will not show up. [/list]
*[u]Note[/u]: this mod is disabled on the floors: Blue Womb, Chest/Dark Room, The Void and Home due to the shape of their first room.
**[u]Note[/u]: you will remain with: [list] [*]1 red heart (if you have 1 or more health coontainers) [*]1 black heart (if you have 0 health containers) [/list]
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Afterbirth+ and Repentance.
[hr][/hr] Similar mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2783022037
